CustomField.formula: CASE( Loop__Attach_As__c , "FTP" , Loop__FTP__c , "SFTP" , Loop__FTP__c , "Content", Loop__Content_Workspace__c , "Content - User Selected", Loop__Content_Workspace__c, "Box" , IF( ISBLANK( Loop__Storage_Folder__c ) , "Root", Loop__Storage_Folder__c ) & " [" & HYPERLINK("/apex/loop__ddpEdit?type=storageFolder&cioId=" & Id , "Change" , "_self" ) & "]" , "LOOP Storage", IF( ISBLANK( Loop__Storage_Folder__c ) , "Root", Loop__Storage_Folder__c ) & " [" & HYPERLINK("/apex/loop__ddpEdit?type=storageFolder&cioId=" & Id , "Change" , "_self" ) & "]" , "SpringCM", IF( ISBLANK( Loop__Storage_Folder__c ) , "Root", Loop__Storage_Folder__c ) & " [" & HYPERLINK("/apex/loop__ddpEdit?type=storageFolder&cioId=" & Id , "Change" , "_self" ) & "]" , "Office 365", IF( ISBLANK( Loop__Storage_Folder__c ) , "Root", Loop__Storage_Folder__c ) & " [" & HYPERLINK("/apex/loop__ddpEdit?type=storageFolder&cioId=" & Id , "Change" , "_self" ) & "]" , "Veeva Vault", "Vault Options [" & HYPERLINK("/apex/loop__ddpEdit?type=storageData&cioId=" & Id, "Change", "_self") & "]", "" )
CustomField.label: Storage Location
